text: The Bridge Is Built () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Gavriil Egiazarov and Oleg Efremov.СТРОИТСЯ МОСТСтроится мост (1966) It stars Igor Vasilev, Oleg Tabakov, and Liliya Tolmacheva. == Actors == * Igor Vasilev as Sasha Malashkin * Oleg Tabakov as Sergei Zaytsev * Liliya Tolmacheva as Perova (as Lidiya Tolmachyova) * Galina Volchek as Young Girl * Yevgeny Yevstigneyev as Sinaysky * Lyudmila Gurchenko as Zhenya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Gavriil Egiazarov
title: The Bridge Is Built
